page.title: 15A1 (ATTITUDES) - WETHERBY
page.content: The new{A1}trunk road sounds good to some and bad to others. Owners {think} they have lost value on their houses; estimates varied from Â£500-Â£7000; but they still think that they can sell their homes at a reasonable price. It seems the ends of some gardens are going to be cut off, so greenhouses, sheds etc., are going to have to be moved. At least four owners will be so affected. For most people safety is not a major concern. Occupants said that they might install double glazing if the noise is bad, but if the noise isn't too bad then there is no point, so most were going to wait and see. Most of the people asked, thought that the road was necessary, even though many who were asked did not know much about it, despite information in local newspapers.
